sentences.en: A burning blush upon the girl's face showed that she understood the old man's allusion.
sentences.cn: 热辣辣的红晕涌上了少女的脸颊,这说明她知道老人的言外之意.

sentences.en: But in the end it transpired that the allusion was characteristically to an Edwardian popular song.
sentences.cn: 但后来表明,这首诗是典型地模仿了爱德华七世时期的一首流行歌曲.

sentences.en: Harry was hurt by an allusion to his failure.
sentences.cn: 有人暗讽哈利的失败,使他受到伤害.

sentences.en: He looked like his allusion as he raised his eyes to Mr. Lorry's face.
sentences.cn: 他显出如他所说的譬喻的表情,当他的眼睛仰望着劳雷先生的脸的时候.

sentences.en: He made no allusion to his term being near.
sentences.cn: 他一句也没提到,他的期限已近在眉睫.

sentences.en: He resents any allusion to his baldness.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌人家影射他秃顶.

sentences.en: He was hurt by any allusion to his previous misconduct.
sentences.cn: 任何提及到他行为失检的话都会伤他的感情.

sentences.en: His brows clouded at the allusion.
sentences.cn: 对于这一引喻,他双眉紧锁着.

sentences.en: Mr. B may get hurt by your allusion to his previous scandal.
sentences.cn: (你暗指B先生过去的丑闻,会令他难过.)

sentences.en: Mr. Fang, you should have recognized the allusion . You're not like us!
sentences.cn: 方先生, 你应该知道出典, 你不比我们 呀 !

sentences.en: Perhaps blue eyelashes are this allusive sign , virginal behavior this fragile allusion.
sentences.cn: 可能,蓝色眼睫就是挑逗,静若处女就是似有若无的撩拨.

sentences.en: The allusion served as a timely reminder to Darnay.
sentences.cn: 这暗示即刻提醒了代尔那.

sentences.en: The form of allusion refers to steady and concise expression of language.
sentences.cn: 典面是指典故的相对稳定和精练的语言表达形式.

sentences.en: The preacher likes to make an allusion to Homer while preaching.
sentences.cn: 那牧师在传道时喜欢间接提到荷马.

sentences.en: The title is per-haps an allusion to AIDS.
sentences.cn: 该题目可能暗指艾滋病。

sentences.en: This last point was understood to be an allusion to the long-standing hostility between the two leaders.
sentences.cn: 这最后一点曾被理解为对这两位领导人之间长久敌意的一种影射。

words.tran_cn: 暗指，转弯抹角地说到；略为提及，顺便提到

trans.tran_en: something said or written that mentions a subject, person etc indirectly
